replies.body:
Essentially, 99% of the community is unaffected.

It's nice to see Riot actually listening to their playerbase though.
yeah 1% of the player base -_- isnt alot. what about the other 99% of the player base?!

bruh, this is riot listening to their player base.
its hella rare for a games company to go back on such a  big decision because we said so, look at blizzard and WoW, they ran it into the ground by not listening... Riot may do some weird stuff, but bringing back legitimacy to their ranked system after our call for it... this is awesome
WoW is still far from dead mate, So your point is invalid.
Didn't say it was dead dude, just said they made some questionable decisions that weren't necessarily good for the game, I love WoW and saying my point is invalid was uncalled for
The other 99% of the player base is just repeatedly saying "we want urf!" so fuck 'em.

You fail to realize it's that top 1% of their player base that promote their game and are the most passionate about the game, of course yes they wanted to put their work towards the other 99% of the community by bringing out dynamic but with all the professional and top tier players complaining and being unhappy with the current gimped ranked system the ones under who look up to these players will also follow suit. 

TLDR: This is a very big step in the right direction

Just cross posting this from the NA page for visibility =D

> First off, making these changes now doesn’t mean we think we’re finished with ranked. This is just what’s going to be happening in the immediate future, and we’re specifically focusing on high elo because that’s where the problems are the most extreme. There will be more changes for 2017, and they will not just be for Diamond and above. We’re not trying to neglect other players, we just need some more time before we make our next announcement. Expect that in September.
Riot Calad

How about give us Normal Draft back if you care about competitive integrity? It is impossible to play the game how it's meant to be played because you have to go into ranked entirely unprepared for what the meta currently is, because you can't practice draft pick.

Hey CapNRoddy,
Normal Draft was a VERY unhealthy queue.
Queue times were higher than 30 minutes at any level and teams were not balanced.
Unfortunately in OCE this queue is almost impossible to sustain.

All of your data says that the new champ select is a better experience. But sure, lets not give it to players.

Replace Blink Pick.

You don't know unhealthy until you've played blind pick with Yasuo in 100% of games.  It's really not fun seeing almost no variety because there's no bans. You guys have really made ranked inaccessible to a lot of people who weren't already well versed in it by leaving out the ability to practice. This is ridiculous. I feel like I've been ripped off by transferring to this server and losing so much of the game.
Also teambuilder lasted for a while and teambuilder completely sucked.
The Autofill grace period is for everyone. So technically 100% of players are affected in one way or another.
this was cuz of marc's reddit post LUL
I saw the draft of this post like a week ago. Crap timing, but unrelated.
what about us people in lower elo!!! Do you even care for you player base?

They did, that's why they brought out dynamic queue for 99% of the community, veterans and their most passionate players of the whole player base either left or didn't play this season because of the ranked system being gimped, now that they are working on fixing this system for their top 1% of the player base, these players will give a positive opinion on League of Legends. Don't make uneducated comments like this, what are you? Bronze?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

These comments though. 

Riot: We are listening, and are now implementing solo queue for where dynamic queue negatively impacted the experience of the players.

Low elo players: yeah, but that's only 1%. Why not focus on all of us!!

Well there we go. It turns out us low elo players really are generally stupid. We deserve to remain in hell for being this retarded.

How to get out of Bronze?
I play so hard try to defend all the lanes and carry the team but i am stuck with noobs, in all the games i play better but then i got 1 or 2 feeders in my team with lame excuses. Please think about bronze dont allow players to play ranked who dont have proper knowledge about the game.
By any chance can i do my placements again?
At the time when i played my placement matches i was bad and i didnt took my games seriously, but now i am pretty sure that i can do better than most of the bronze. Cheers

dont want to sound like a asshole but your in bronze because thats where your skill is, you might be better then people in bronze, but your skill lies where your rank is, dont give up once you improve you will realise a climb in rank

I know the feels, but these games were already lost anyway mate. You should just try to focus on cs because even if you have good mechanics on a champ, you will get outscaled otherwise. Watch some of your own replays too, it helps a lot. 

PS: Objectives over kills.

Man its hard but you will climb, takes time work and patience i started this season in b5 (after being stuck there for nearly 3 years) im currently in Gold4, this is from solo quieing as i said it is possible just hard, keep at it bud if your meant to be higher than bronze you will get there :)

Ook Ook is right. Keep working at it. You will get there. I had my highest position thus far this ranked season recently and although it was b4 I got higher than anything this year. I am still working hard and am still having some troubles but I know I just need to work just a little bit harder every game. #Patiencematters

replies.poster: O V 3 R L O R D
replies.body: what ever happened to that roundtable video where you said you are never bringing back solo q, like ever
just don't bring in that 2 ladder bs, shit idea
Dam. I wish they would have implemented this for platinum players too, we plat players get autofilled matched up against 4 mans and have a pretty long queue time aswell.
This is mainly focused for Diamond+, but Rito are also changing a few things to make a healthy ranked experience for **everyone**. :)
LP gain/loss based on actual performance not just whether you win or lose, include KDA, CS etc to influence the point gain loss???

The game is about winning. Not what your KDA is, not your CS and not anything else. There are so many actions you can take in this game that won't get you better stats but can redefine and turnaround games. Until you have algorithms good enough to identify these decisions there's not point having a system like that; this means you basically need AI so good it could win every game

do something about the toxic community low tier ranked is just cancerous to play in i've been playing this game since 2012 and i enjoy the game alot its just the cancerous players that make the game unenjoyable
RIOT PLS FIX RIVEN WHY BUFF ULT {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
you haven't even vs a postpatch-riven.
{{champion:157}}

Good to see riot do something about 

Boosters
Smurfs
Trolls
Afkers
Feeders
Toxicity

Oh wait........

"Finally, while we’ve heard some comments suggesting otherwise, it’s never been a goal for us to make League more casual. We believe League is for hardcore gamers"
so this is why you aint bringing back URF
